welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Moorslede, Belgium! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque town known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and savor all that Moorslede has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lesquin Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
